languages.text: "По стати узнаю вожака и настоящего воина. Да, все еще недостойного жить ксеноса, но — воина. Спорю, что этот благородный безумец битвы падет от моей руки!" {n}Ульфар обводит отряд радостным взглядом, словно ожидает, что кто-то примет его пари.{/n}

"I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}
languages.original_text: "По стати узнаю вожака и настоящего воина. Да, все еще недостойного жить ксеноса, но — воина. Спорю, что этот благородный безумец битвы падет от моей руки!" {n}Ульфар обводит отряд радостным взглядом, словно ожидает, что кто-то примет его пари.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

"I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

"I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

"I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

languages.text: 「指導者にして真の戦士が、こいつの中に見える。ああ、異種族の命に価値などないのは変わらんが、戦士だって何ら変わらんさ。この高潔な戦闘狂は、なんとしても俺の手で倒す！」{n}ウルファーは自分が他人の賭けの対象になることを望んでいるかのように、歓喜の姿を一行に見せる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「指導者にして真の戦士が、こいつの中に見える。ああ、異種族の命に価値などないのは変わらんが、戦士だって何ら変わらんさ。この高潔な戦闘狂は、なんとしても俺の手で倒す！」{n}ウルファーは自分が他人の賭けの対象になることを望んでいるかのように、歓喜の姿を一行に見せる。{/n}

languages.text: “我承认他是位不错的领袖，也是位真正的战士。没错，虽然它是个该死的异形，但他也是个战士。我敢打赌，我肯定能亲手干掉这个值得尊重的战斗疯子。”{n}乌尔法欣喜地环顾四周，仿佛在期待有人与他对赌。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我承认他是位不错的领袖，也是位真正的战士。没错，虽然它是个该死的异形，但他也是个战士。我敢打赌，我肯定能亲手干掉这个值得尊重的战斗疯子。”{n}乌尔法欣喜地环顾四周，仿佛在期待有人与他对赌。{/n}

languages.text: « Celui-ci est un véritable guerrier, un meneur. Cela dit, il n'en reste pas moins un xénos qui mérite de mourir. Je vous parie que ce forcené du combat tombera de mes mains ! » {n}Ulfar lance un regard jovial au groupe, comme s'il s'attendait à ce que quelqu'un relève le défi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Celui-ci est un véritable guerrier, un meneur. Cela dit, il n’en reste pas moins un xénos qui mérite de mourir. Je vous parie que ce forcené du combat tombera de mes mains ! » {n}Ulfar lance un regard jovial au groupe, comme s'il s'attendait à ce que quelqu'un relève le défi.{/n}

languages.text: «Puedo ver que este es un líder y un auténtico guerrero. Sí, sigue siendo un xenos cochambroso, pero no deja de ser un guerrero. ¡Daré muerte a este noble obsesionado con la guerra!», {n}Ulfar lanza una mirada alegre al grupo, como si esperara que alguien aceptara su apuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Puedo ver que este es un líder y un auténtico guerrero. Sí, sigue siendo un xenos cochambroso, pero no deja de ser un guerrero. ¡Daré muerte a este noble obsesionado con la guerra!», {n}Ulfar lanza una mirada alegre al grupo, como si esperara que alguien aceptara su apuesta.{/n}

languages.text: "Der hier ist ein Anführer und ein wahrer Krieger. Ja, er ist immer noch ein Xenos, der des Lebens unwürdig ist, aber dennoch ein Krieger. Ich wette, dieser noble Wahnsinnige der Schlacht wird durch meine Hand fallen." {n}Ulfar lässt seinen Blick freudig über die Gruppe schweifen, als würde er erwarten, dass jemand seine Wette annimmt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der hier ist ein Anführer und ein wahrer Krieger. Ja, er ist immer noch ein Xenos, der des Lebens unwürdig ist, aber dennoch ein Krieger. Ich wette, dieser noble Wahnsinnige der Schlacht wird durch meine Hand fallen." {n}Ulfar lässt seinen Blick freudig über die Grupppe schweifen, als würde er erwarten, dass jemand seine Wette annimmt.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunun bir lider ve gerçek bir savaşçı olduğunu görebiliyorum. Evet, yaşamaya layık olmayan bir zeno olduğu gerçek ama yine de bir savaşçı. Bahse girerim ki bu delirmiş soylu savaşçı, benim ellerimde can verecek!" {n}Ulfar, âdeta birilerinin ona karşı bahse girmesini bekliyormuş gibi yanındakilere neşeli bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I recognise a leader and a true warrior in this one. Yes, still a xenos unworthy of life, but a warrior all the same. I bet this noble madman of battle will fall by my hand!" {n}Ulfar casts a joyous look over the party, as if expecting someone to take him up on the wager.{/n}
